metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4603 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The exception::getTraceAsString function in Zend/zend_exceptions.c in PHP before 5.4.40, 5.5.x before 5.5.24, and 5.6.x before 5.6.8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an unexpected data type, related to a "type confusion" issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4603` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
libapache2-mod-php5filter - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
libphp5-embed - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php-pear - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-cgi - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-cli - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-common - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-curl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-enchant - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-fpm - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-gd - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-gmp - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-intl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-ldap - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-mysql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-mysqlnd - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-odbc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-pgsql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-pspell - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-readline - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-recode - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-snmp - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-sqlite - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-sybase - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-tidy - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-xmlrpc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
php5-xsl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.11').
